Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Cup
Description: Wheel-made cup, made from a buff-coloured clay with organic temper, with an ovoid base, a concave lip about 0,5 - 0,6 cm in thickness and no apparent decorative motif. Highly friable, the rim has been damaged in places. Good quality craftsmanship.
